title: Possible bug with Mordekaiser ghost.
body:
Was playing Mordekaiser{{champion:82}}  and noticed that when ever i ulti Azir{{champion:268}}  and he dies, the ghost spawns and follows me around but i can't control the ghost like i normally can when killing other champions.  

This happened twice in the same game. I was forced to ulti other champions instead so that i could use the ghost to push towers.
